price: 59. Hubaal Saacadda (Qiyaame) waa imaanaysaa, shaki kuma jiro, dadka badankiisuse ma ay rumaysna.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَأٓتِيَةٞ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna al-sāʿata laātiyatun lā rayba fīhā walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yu'minūna
